name: Thailand Advenutres - Parachute Jump, Scuba Dive, Dirt Bikes, Windsurfing & Climbing
description: If you want to have a great Adventure here in Thailand then this Tour is for you. You will travel to the Best area's of Thailand where you can Ride Dirt Bike and ATV's, Parachute Jump, Climb Rocks in one of the top 10 climbing area's of the world, Scuba Dive or just Snorkel in the clear warm waters of the Anderman Sea and Kite/Windsurf off the beach in Hua Hin.
